VERTICAL_DESCRIPTION: Should the profile pictures be joined vertically?
BADGE_DESCRIPTION: Change your badge on the server
COLOR_DESCRIPTION: Change your color on the server
FAKE_DESCRIPTION: Send a message faking being someone else
MATCH_DESCRIPTION: Match profile pictures of two users
PROFILE_DESCRIPTION: Get profile information of a user
STICKER_DESCRIPTION: Add a sticker to the server
UNDO_DESCRIPTION: Undo the last deletion or edit of a message in the channel (up to 5 minutes)
UPTIME_DESCRIPTION: Check how long the bot has been online
COMMAND_EMOTE_ADD_ERR_WITHOUT_PERM: You do not have permission to manage emotes.
COMMAND_EMOTE_ADD_ERR_LARGE_IMAGE: The image is very large. Please check the [documentation]({}).
COMMAND_EMOTE_ADD_ERR_NO_EMOTE_ARGS: Please use one of the two optional arguments.
COMMAND_EMOTE_ADD_ERR_WRONG_URL: Please only use images uploaded to Discord.
